projects.name: Build.me
projects.description: Price aggregator for computer parts. Simplifies PC part price comparisons by collating data from local e-commerce platforms with analytical and data visualization tools.

projects.name: Lights & Locks
projects.description: An open-source e-commerce platform for lights and locks. Customers can search, purchase, and service products while admins manage service requests.

projects.name: TaskMaster
projects.description: A mobile-friendly to-do list app with user accounts, tags, filtering, and search capabilities. Features a clean UI for task prioritization and management.
